value.title: Best Practice for Power BI Workspace Roles Setup
value.excerpt: Power BI workspaces are not like old days, that we had Edit access and View access anymore. You have more options for roles in a workspace, and in my courses, I have found that many people choose the incorrect role without knowing what the role does. In this video, I'll explain all the roles in the workspace,
